attributes.action: Force all political parties to form a coalition gov’t while they sort out brexit
attributes.additional_details: Whatever outcome you want; leave, remain, second vote, Mr Bean for European leader! we need all MPs to work together for this issue to be resolved.
attributes.background:
The two main political parties fighting and posturing about brexit, either trying to avoid comment or shouting down the opposition. 

Let’s make them ‘play nicely’ together by working as one for the good of the nation.
